languages.text: "Когда у вас будет время, найдите меня на мостике. Я желаю подать полный рапорт".
languages.translation_comment:
есть романс
убираем Сола через зтм

languages.text: "Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."
languages.original_text: "Когда у вас будет время, найдите меня на мостике. Я желаю подать полный рапорт".

traits.locale_text: "Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."
"Find me on the bridge when you have time. We need to talk."
"Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."
"Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."
"Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."
"Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."
"Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."

languages.translation_comment:
есть романс
убираем Сола через зтм

languages.text: 「時間があるときにブリッジに来てください。全面的な報告を提出いたします」
languages.original_text: "Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."

traits.locale_text: 「時間があるときにブリッジに来てください。話をしましょう」

languages.text: "Kommt zu mir auf die Brücke, wenn Ihr Zeit habt. Ich möchte Euch umfassend Bericht erstatten."
languages.original_text: "Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."

traits.locale_text: "Kommt zu mir auf die Brücke, wenn Ihr Zeit habt. Ich möchte Euch umfassend Bericht erstatten."

languages.text: « Retrouvez-moi sur la passerelle quand vous le pourrez. J'aimerais vous faire un rapport circonstancié. »
languages.original_text: "Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."

traits.locale_text: « Retrouvez-moi sur la passerelle quand vous le pourrez. J'aimerais vous faire un rapport circonstancié. »

languages.text: «Búsqueme en el puente cuando disponga de tiempo. Quiero presentar un informe completo».
languages.original_text: "Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."

traits.locale_text: «Búsqueme en el puente cuando disponga de tiempo. Quiero presentar un informe completo».

languages.text: “有时间的话来舰桥找我吧，我准备了一份详尽的报告。”
languages.original_text: "Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."

traits.locale_text: “有时间的话来舰桥找我吧，我准备了一份详尽的报告。”

languages.text: "Vakit olduğunda köprüde buluşalım. Detaylıca rapor vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "Find me on the bridge when you have time. I wish to give a full report."

traits.locale_text: "Vakit olduğunda köprüde buluşalım. Detaylıca rapor vereceğim."
